Alternatively, if you're in the mood for something more lighthearted and quirky, I suggest checking out "Uptown Girls" starring Marley Shelton and Donald Faison. This offbeat comedy follows a grown-up woman who keeps her childish instincts and behavior, and it's a fun and entertaining watch. 😊
